# Load

```{r,echo=FALSE,results = "asis"}
rm(list = ls())
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
library(modelsummary) # for N in datasummary
# set constant ----
# set constant ----
n_observation_list <-
  c(50, 100, 200, 1000)
sigma_list <-
  c(0.001, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0)

# load, estimate, and save data ----
## linear demand and linear cost ----
### with demand_shifter_y ----
for(nn in 1:length(n_observation_list)){
  for(ss in 1:length(sigma_list)){
    temp_nn <-
      n_observation_list[nn]
    temp_sigma <-
      sigma_list[ss]
    filename <-
      paste(
        "linear_linear_",
        "n_",
        temp_nn,
        "_sigma_",
        temp_sigma,
        sep = ""
      )
    cat(filename,"\n")
    # load 
    target_data <-
      readRDS(file = 
                here::here(
                  paste(
                    "R/output/data_",
                    filename,
                    ".rds",
                    sep = ""
                  )
                )
      )
    assign(
      filename,
      target_data)
  }
}

generate_plot <-
  function(
    data
  ){
    temp <-
      data %>% 
      dplyr::filter(group_id_k < 10)
    x <-
      ggplot(temp,
            aes(x = Q, y = P)) + 
      geom_point(alpha = 0.3) + 
      stat_smooth(method = "lm",
                    se = FALSE) +
      theme_classic() + 
      scale_color_viridis_d() +
      theme(legend.position = 'top',
        legend.text = element_text(size=8)) +
      #ggtitle("Freight rate (CPI adjusted to 1995)") +
      theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) +
      xlab("Q") + 
      ylab("P")
    return(x)
  }

options(modelsummary_format_numeric_latex = "plain") # for modelsummary output
```
